expo.name: PanHandler
expo.description: PanHandler - Precise CAD measurements from photos. Use coins for calibration, measure distances, angles, areas, and export to CAD software.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PanHandler needs camera access to take reference photos for measurements.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PanHandler needs photo library access to save measurements and export images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: PanHandler needs permission to save measurement images to your photo library.
